content: here is our newest cap called the crochet for cancer basketweave vertical stripe cap designed specifically for those providing caps for cancer patients we would love to see your photos on our facebook page www facebook com/crochetforcancer design by tracy wells co-founder crochet for cancer increase with assistance by paula daniele crochet hooks you **materials required** 1 skein of red heart with love / medium worsted weight yarn category 4 5 5mm/i9 crochet hook craft scissors yarn needle step-by-step video tutorial available http //youtu be/gg_tnagqkok
